items.content_html: Typemill is a lightweight, flat-file CMS designed for simple, fast, and flexible website and eBook creation using Markdown.

items.content_html: "ThemeLab is a lightweight, configurable theming library to help you manage and apply themes in your app. Developed for easy use in any frontend framework or libraries with direct focus on development ease in setting up a fully fledged configurable themes for your application."
items.title: martinmanu/theme-labs: "ThemeLab is a lightweight, configurable theming library to help you manage and apply themes in your app. Developed for easy use in any frontend framework or libraries with direct focus on development ease in setting up a fully fledged configurable themes for your application."

items.content_html: SmartEnvSwitcher is a lightweight Node.js library for managing environment variables across multiple environments, such as development, staging, and production. It simplifies the process of switching between environments and updating `.env` files programmatically.
items.title: Amit2197/smart-env-switcher: SmartEnvSwitcher is a lightweight Node.js library for managing environment variables across multiple environments, such as development, staging, and production. It simplifies the process of switching between environments and updating `.env` files programmatically.

items.content_html: A modern web-based audio player with a sleek, customizable interface and comprehensive playback controls. Features include real-time progress tracking, dynamic song selection, and extensive theme customization options including colors, gradients, and fonts. Built with vanilla JavaScript and designed to be lightweight and responsive, the player inc

items.content_html: Easy-to-use and lightweight library for caching and serving static resources locally, drastically reducing bandwidth usage and greatly improving load speeds. Especially useful for larger websites or for mobile/PWA apps that need have offline capabilities.
